## Introduction

Scientific literature reviews are essential for understanding the current state of knowledge in any field. However, keeping up with the ever-growing volume of research can be overwhelming. In this blog post, I will demonstrate how to automate the literature review process using R, creating a smart and efficient research database. This includes:

- Collecting data from Google Scholar and other open-access sources
- Processing and organizing the data
- Analyzing trends and visualizing results
- Automatically updating and monitoring publications
- Summarizing literature using text mining techniques

Let’s dive in!
